labels.name: Name
labels.selectGroup: Select a group to add {{userName}} to.

messages.emptyGroups: This user hasn't been added to any groups.
messages.inviteUsersMessage: Send an invitation email to users to create an account or copy and share the invitation link.
messages.mustSelectGroup: You must select a group first
messages.removeUserFromGroup: Are you sure you want to remove {{userName}} from {{groupName}}? This action cannot be undone.
messages.removeInvitation: You are about to remove the pending invite for the selected users. This action can not be undone. Would you like to continue?
messages.removeUser: Are you sure you want to remove {{userName}} from {{departmentName}}? This user will still have access to their account, but will no longer be tied to this department. This action cannot be undone.
messages.resetPassword: Would you like to send a password reset link to {{userName}}?
